sentence.Network_en: The chieftain of that country is disguised as a benefactor this time.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个国家的首领这一次伪装出一副施恩者的姿态.

sentence.Network_en: The enemy chieftain was opposed and deserted by his followers.
There he met the famous Shoshone chieftain Washakie.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那里他碰到了著名的绍山酋长华谢基.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... chamberlain 财务管理人 chieftain 酋长，头子 chanpain 小教堂的牧师.
英语广播词汇（1） ... chiefly adv. 主要地，尤其 chieftain n. 首领，族长 childhood n. 幼年（时代），童年.
头字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 头重脚轻〖 top-heavy;beweigheddown〗 头子〖 chieftain〗 头座〖 headstock〗.
英语单词立体记忆 ... He is a chemist. 他是一位化学家。 → chieftain 族长，酋长 → tissue 纸巾，薄绢，薄纸.

list.abs: 两个就够了牛头人酋长 (Tauren Chieftain)　　这些年长的牛头人战士在日常生活中和战斗中都出色地领导着他们高贵而纯朴的部族.他们 …
pb如何去掉tab键 -天涯问答 ... 先知( Far Seer) 牛头酋长( Tauren Chieftain) 暗影猎手( shadow Hunter).

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English and Old French chevetaine, from late Latin capitaneus (see captain). The spelling was altered by association with chief

entry.def: A chieftain is the leader of a tribe.

example.tran: 传说中的不列颠部落首领——亚瑟王

means.word_mean: 1. the leader of a group of people;
2. the head of a tribe or clan

auth_sentence.content: Was one of my ancestors the Irish chieftain Brian Boru?
auth_sentence.res_content: Was one of my ancestors the Irish chieftain Brian Boru?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Was one of my ancestors the Irish chieftain Brian Boru?

auth_sentence.content: Other Chiefs...obtested their Chieftain to leave them...to the leading of Ardenvohr.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other Chiefs...obtested their Chieftain to leave them...to the leading of Ardenvohr.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Other Chiefs...obtested their Chieftain to leave them...to the leading of Ardenvohr.

auth_sentence.content: Reducing to obedience their seditious chieftain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reducing to obedience their seditious chieftain.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"……人或物"; 2. 也可以表示形容词

stems_affixes.word_buile: river河边+ain……人或物→住在河边的人
river河边+ain……人或物→住在河边的人
chief首领+ain……人或物→n.[强盗]首领;族长
